name: Oskar's Maze
description:
Press X (or tap, on mobile) to switch which panel you directly manipulate. You can only switch between 2, but they each control a different axis of the third.

The panels represent 3 sides of a type of "oskar's cube", a shuttle maze where you manipulate a 'shuttle' composed of 3 perpendicular sticks through a cube comprised of mazes. The puzzle is named after it's inventor,  Dutch designer Oskar van Deventer.

Solutions:
Level 1
Level 2
Level 3
Level 4 IS possible.
(Though it may not show up correctly on phones with smaller screens...)
